channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Nanit Home Display Review: A Transformative Tablet
item.description: The innovative smart baby monitor ecosystem adds a tablet to its lineup. Is it worth overlooking some quirks?

item.title: I’m finally beginning to trust Microsoft’s handheld Xbox
item.description: I still wouldn't buy an Xbox Ally, and I still don't think the tweaked version of Windows that shipped with it is ready for primetime. The Xbox Full Screen Experience (FSE) needs work. But two months after I panned the cheaper $600 white Xbox Ally and wasn't quite sold on the $1,000 black one, one […]

item.title: Robin Hood episode 8 proved we should ‘celebrate our power’ — and star Connie Nielsen wants us to do the same
item.description: If women aren’t watching Robin Hood by episode 8, they need to now — one star has just ‘informed our view of who we can really be’.

item.title: iPadOS 26.2 is rolling out now, and it makes multitasking much easier – here's what's new
item.description: Split View and Slide Over are getting more straightforward with the latest iPadOS update, available now.

item.title: The Best Bike Gear for Your Brisk, Wintry Commute (2025)
item.description: Stay strong, fair-weather friends—you can keep biking to work even through the darkest, coldest days.

item.title: AI image generators are getting better by getting worse
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on smartphones and digital imagery - real or otherwise - follow Allison Johnson. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started Remember the early days of […]

item.title: A new old idea about video stores
item.description: Hi, friends! Welcome to Installer No. 109, your guide to the best and Verge-iest stuff in the world. (If you're new here, welcome, hope you're staying warm, and also you can read all the old editions at the Installer homepage.) This week, I've been reading about Google Maps and shopaganda and life as a pop […]

item.title: Puissance, prix, jeux, sortie : tout ce que l’on sait sur la Xbox de prochaine génération
item.description: En 2026, Microsoft fêtera les 25 ans de sa console Xbox. Le géant devrait officiellement dévoiler sa nouvelle génération de consoles Xbox. Voici tout ce que l'on sait déjà sur la console.

item.title: Grâce à Amazon, la tablette Honor Pad X9a avec écran 2,5K 120 Hz est 100 € moins chère qu’à son lancement
item.description: La tablette Honor Pad X9a est une version allégée et plus abordable que l'Honor Pad 9 classique. Elle reste bien équipée et surtout son prix passe de 249,90 euros à 149,90 euros sur Amazon.
